items.name: Hollow Seeker
items.description: Go forward in right direction. Seek a hollow as refuge not to be crushed.
items.author: OBONO

items.name: Hopper
items.description: Jump on panels and go up (foreground side). If you fall toward bottom, the game is over.
items.author: OBONO

items.name: Chri-Bocchi Cat
items.description: Move the cat and bounce gift boxes for 2 minutes.
items.author: OBONO

items.name: Chie Magari Ita
items.description: Place 10 different pieces into the frame without overlapping.
items.author: OBONO

items.name: Psi Colo
items.description: A puzzle game with dice on the 5x7 grid field.
items.author: OBONO
